author: Nick Nairn
method: Place all the ingredients into a bowl and mix together. To serve, transfer into a serving bowl and place the mint sprig on top to decorate.
ingredients: 50g/1½oz oats , toasted,  50ml/2fl oz double cream, whipped,  150g/5&frac12oz Greek yoghurt,  50g/1¾oz blueberries,  2 tbsp honey,  mint sprig, to garnish
